title: How do I connect to a device if no devices are discovered?
answer:
If no devices are discovered, no other DLNA devices are available in the Wi-Fi network or other DLNA devices have not been discovered yet. 

 You can also follow the instruction shown in Figure 3-4 to enable Wi-Fi Direct and search for a Miracast device. 

Figure 1-1[Message displayed when no DLNA devices are discovered]() 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109626)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109627)
